org.deeplearning4j.plot

Class PlotFilters

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.plot.PlotFilters

  • public class PlotFilters
extends java.lang.Object
    Based on the work by krizshevy et. al Plot filters takes in either 2d or 4d input 2d input represents one matrix. Typically for RBMs and AutoEncoders this will be a transposed nout x nin matrix. For 4d input (multiple channels and images) the input should of shape:Au channels x number images x rows x columns

      • PlotFilters

        public PlotFilters(INDArray input,
                   int[] tileShape,
                   int[] tileSpacing,
                   int[] imageShape)
        Parameters:
        input - a 2d or 4d matrix (see the input above)
        tileShape - the tile shape (typically 10,10)
        tileSpacing - the tile spacing(typically 0,0 or 1,1)
        imageShape - the intended image shape
